name: Key Slaughter
description:
P.O.V. : You are a programmer and you're in crunch time. It's up to you to absolutely slaughter those keys as long as possible. You need to defeat a new wave of enemies every 12 seconds.

Use WASD to move and left click to shoot. Press R to restart.

This game was made for a game jam held in the Game Endeavor Discord server.

Credits:

Programming: me

SFX: me

Art: me

Music: 

"The Animal Inside(Instrumental)" by Sinyells
